entry.title: WIND WARNING, Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers near the British Columbia border early this morning. Amount 5 mm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of rain near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 mm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. 40 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
